page.title: 09May Day Celebrations
page.content: Every{May Day}morning the school go into the hall to celebrate.The girls do{country dances}and{Maypole}and the boys do{Morris.}Our school maypole is green with 12 red and yellow ribbons.Girl dancers wear pink,yellow or green floral dresses.The Maypole dances are Spider's Web,Daisy Chain,Single Plait,Double Plait and Gypsy's Tent.The Morris dances are Leominster which is a short stick,four man dance,Steeple Claydon which is a six man clapping dance,Shooting which is a six man dance with long sticks and Fox and Grapes which is a short stick six man dance.The Morris dancers wear dark trousers,white shirts and a red tabard with Whittington Castle and two swans on the back.At the end we all join in a country dance.
